text: The fortune you seek is in another cookie.
You will be hungry again in an hour.
Vision without action is a daydream. Action without vision is a nightmare.
Out of the frying pan and into the fire.
To truly find yourself you should play hide and seek alone
Git is hard, but you're doing better than you think
It’s the little details that are vital. Little things make big things happen
Big journeys begin with a single step.
Tomorrow will be a better day and if not, there’s always chocolate.
You have another lightning talk next week.
